review: super fast SHIPPING!!!  Thanks.  Works great!!
author: John Bradley "John Bradley"

review: I am very very very happy with my TV fire stick. Normally you can't get everything you want but this is as close as it comes. Bye, I am off to watch?
author: John Jackson

review: Love this! I was able to cancel cable, don't even miss it now.
author: Shea C. "geekprincess"

review: Wow. This is an amazing product for only $39. The expansive number of platforms are incredible all in HD quality. This puts my old Roku to shame. I am actually now considering downgrading my cable TV to just the basic plan for local stations and use my fire stick for all my entertainment viewing.
author: Thomas E. Hansen

review: Just absolutely love our Amazon Fire Stick!
author: Adele Cochran

review: We have been using this for a good month now.  We really love it.
author: Timothy Fennema
